attributes.action: provide urgent relief for those who have suffered in recent months from rebel attacks in DRC and CAR and to help ensure the safety of the population in those areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rebel forces have for the past months been active in the north east of DRC and the east of CAR operating in areas
far from strong national military forces. They have taken advantage of the defenceless population and have killed hundreds, kidnapped men women and children, destroyed villages,
burnt crops and created havoc among the populations of those areas. Thousands are displaced as a result of these attacks and are in need of immediate help and support. We petition the UK government to help provide relief and support for the suffering population without delay and to take such action as is necessary to stop the activities of the rebels in these areas.
